review_title: I have professional and expert experience in this position.
pros: The ability to work with others by sharing my experience, strength, and hope. Colleagues are friendly and everyone is willing to help each other. The flexible scheduling so I was able to attend school. The opportunities for advancement. The genuine compensation for the clients
cons: I enjoy working for this agency so I don't have anything negative to say about this company

pros: The large caseload allowed you to bill a lot for the company.
cons: Lack of communication between staff. Demanding requirements. Unrealistic expectations from billable staff.

job_title: Certified Peer Support Specialist in Lincoln Park, MI
pros: Great coworkers and colleagues. Still not worth it.
cons:
Too many administrators. Very manipulative upper management. The left hand never knows what the right hand is doing. The work environment is very toxic which is ironic considering it's a mental health agency. 
They have little to zero regard for staff. They are like sociopaths. The end justifies the means.

No turnover in administration yet frequent turnover in therapists, case managers, and front desk support staff. For a “non-profit” the company is more interested in the bottom line and billable services. Too much paperwork and not enough time to do it and very low pay.

pros: Working with a supportive staff, but be careful who's a snake in the grass
cons: Everything. Glaring lack of support from management

pros:
- great coworkers
- work with a variety of people
- union job
- training opportunities
- good experience (looks good on resume)
cons:
- pay is terrible
- time off is unrealistic (earn around 3 hours each pay period)
- not very many advancement opportunities
- there is a lack of communication between departments

pros: you have a job and some money to get every two weeks
cons: everything about this place. no room for growth. Belittling staff by members of executive board. Sloppy union that gladly takes your dues but doesn't give anything in return. High turn over.

job_title: Outpatient Substance Abuse Therapist in Tampa, FL
cons: Too many changes in paperwork in short time period.
